kw.name: Copy Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a copy of the given dictionary.

kw.name: Get Current Date
kw.doc: Returns current local or UTC time with an optional increment.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Set Headers
kw.doc: *Sets new request headers or updates the existing.*

kw.name: Post
kw.doc: *Sends a POST request to the endpoint.*

kw.name: Output Schema
kw.doc: *Outputs JSON Schema to terminal or a file.*

kw.name: Integer
kw.doc: *Asserts the field as JSON integer.*

kw.name: String
kw.doc: *Asserts the field as JSON string.*

kw.name: Object
kw.doc: *Asserts the field as JSON object.*

kw.name: Array
kw.doc: *Asserts the field as JSON array.*

kw.name: Array
kw.doc: *Asserts the field as JSON array.*

kw.name: String
kw.doc: *Asserts the field as JSON string.*
